duties_responsibilities.duty: Coordinate scheduling to ensure service delivery in a single-family home and assist with continuous quality improvements in service management.
Assure day-to-day operations are carried out in accordance with the care plans and the intentions of those living in the home.
Provide direct supervision and training to the Direct Support Professionals assigned to the home.
Serve as the first point of contact for external stakeholders and be supervised by the Residential Program Director.
Oversight of program services delivery including mediation administration, meal planning and preparation.
Assist those living in the home with personal and medical cares.
Schedule includes direct support shifts and administrative work, with at least every other weekend required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Social Work, Psychology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
